RECORD.TEXT: 803896937 BH 9086106 130275 6/4/2005 12:00:00 AM Discharge Summary Signed DIS Report Status : Signed DISCHARGE SUMMARY NAME : NEATHE , SAUJULE UNIT NUMBER : 857-34-86 ADMISSION DATE : 06/04/2005 DISCHARGE DATE : 06/10/2005 Continuation of discharge summary by Dr. Linea Lyss ADDENDUM The patient remained with minimal brain stem functioning over this time period . She continued to be hypotensive with increased ICP . She was started on Mannitol , scheduled until normally held for an osm gap greater than 10 , off of pressors , she remained hypotensive , and thus peripheral Neo-Synephrine was continued . After re-discussion with the family on 6/10/05 , it was decided to make the patient comfort measure only , and to extubate her to comfort measures , per the family 's request . The patient was extubated at approximately 1:20 p.m. on 6/10/05 , and was pronounced dead on 6/10/05 at 1:43 p.m. OLE STREET , M.D. DICTATING FOR : Electronically Signed OLE STREET , M.D. 07/20/2005 13:30 _____________________________ OLE STREET , M.D. TR : wc DD : 06/10/2005 TD : 06/13/2005 9:42 A 130275 cc : OLE STREET , M.D. [ report_end ]
